All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Button
Extends the Component class with a Textfield and a Runnable action
Component
Baseclass for a Component
Controller
Handles Player input
Field
The Field will be placed in the Grid and contains a value from 0-9, where 9 indicates a Minefield and the other numbers indicate the number of Mines around the Field.
Gameloop
Handles Events regarding the gameloop.
Grid
The Grid Class is intended to set the structure for the Fields.
ImageMapping
Dataclass to store ImageMappings.
Loader
Loads assets from the resources folder.
Main
Main class.
Menu
Extends the Scene class to create a Menu.
MineField
Extends the Scene Class to create a minefield.
Rectangle
Provides functionalities to create and calculate with rectangles.
Renderer
Renders the game view to the screen
Scene
Baseclass for any Scene.
SceneHandler
Provides functionalities to switch between scenes.
SoundMapping
Dataclass to store SoundMappings.
StaticValues
Dataclass to store fixed values
StaticValues.Corners
Available Rectangle corners
StaticValues.FieldState
Possible states a Field can have
StaticValues.Mode
Avaiable Modes for the Minefield scene
StaticValues.SceneTag
Available Tags for a Scene
Textfield
Extends the Compnent class by adding text, that can be drawn on a surface.
